website_summaries.verdict: Small enough for just about anyone. Big enough for multiple tasks.
cons: Tub material can crack under heavy load

customer_reviews.title: Nice, handy cart
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Rubbermaid garden cart. It's nicely lightweight. The 1st one lasted several years. I'm not allowed to use my wife's cart any longer since I used it like a wheelbarrow. I overloaded the previous one in the bottom deck cracked. Don't get me wrong, this can handle several bags of topsoil. I just tossed a large shovelful of wet sand into it from about 3 feet up. My wife loves this cart. The design is good and it stays put even on unlevel ground because of the 2 wheel 2 peg system. She also likes the small garden tool storage near the handle.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brosch

customer_reviews.title: breaks apart
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace one that developed a crack at the base. Guess what - this one developed a crack in exactly the same place. I'm not a heavy users - but pissed at wasting money and creating environmental damage by wasting plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great product!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for a roughneck that I had for about 20 years. This is one of the best products I have ever used and it has been used for everything from hauling rocks to carrying raked up leaves to using as a cart for plants I needed to move from one location to another. The cart part of my old roughneck is still good after 20 years, it was the wheels that gave out. I would recommend this product to anyone who gardens or farms. It is much easier to use than a wheel barrow and does many of the same jobs with a lot less effort (and I have used wheel barrows in the past). Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Madam Curie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, surprisingly roomy, time will tell if it's as good as it seems
customer_reviews.text: We were tired of replacing our old wheelbarrows every few years. They all had inflatable tires which seemed to have slow leaks but the rust was the most irritating flaw. We looked at poly replacements but they were beyond what we wanted to spend and had the same geometry as our old ones -- not ideal because they were awkward. This new one is much easier for carting medium loads and just makes more sense. That's after about a month's use. Let's see how we feel after the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Mystery Maven

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase for a Remodel
customer_reviews.text: I just finished renovating a home over the course of 4 months. This was among the first purchase I made and certainly became my most valuable tool. I carted over 1000SF of demo'd tile, drywall, and general materials; mixed concrete in it, carried bulk materials and very heavy boxes of tile to and from the truck. I was able to load it pretty much as full as I could lift. It bears the scars of use, but this cart is still going strong and I'm looking forward to using it for the backyard remodel in the spring.
customer_reviews.author: KenAZ

customer_reviews.title: Super durable and super useful
customer_reviews.text: I just bought my second lawn cart. I had my previous one for probably 10 years. Maybe more. And I have loved it. It was extremely durable and easy to maneuver as yard cards go. It has a slightly smaller capacity compared to other carts, but this means overloading doesn't result in a cart that can't be moved! I found the capacity to be sufficient. I also like the feature of the depressed shelf near the handle where I could keep my tools, waste bags and small plants to be planted. I have found multiple uses for it. I highly recommend it. The tan color also makes it attractive enough that when left in the yard it doesn't look unsightly.
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.title: Moves Yard Debris
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this product as a light duty hauler of yard debris, tree trimmings, etc.... I will try to relate using the Rubbermaid tote to a wheel barrow. The wheel barrow will transport more weight, but the Rubbermaid tote will transport similar materials with more security. There won't be any items dropping out of the Rubbermaid tote like would happen with a wheel barrow. This is a great yard tote that won't get a flat tire, will take beating and keep on working. The price is right, too! I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: BigFoot14

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: This cart is just OK - the handles are too low so you find yourself bending over. Also because the wheels are only in the front you have to lift up on the handle to move forward. My last cart had two smaller wheels in the back so you could just push the cart - this way you have to pull up and then push. The box itself is a good size. Will just be using for small yard clean-up tasks. Amazon did a great job getting it to my house - out of the box and ready to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me!
customer_reviews.text: This little wheel barrel is the perfect size and structure for me to use on my small property for little tasks such as moving dirt or garden materials. Easy to store, easy to clean, and durable for my occasional use.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Corey

customer_reviews.title: No complaints here
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my use. A couple weeks ago I had it full to the brim with dirt, probably over the 200 lb limit it advertises, and it held up just fine. I even left it full of dirt for a couple days that it rained, and while it was REALLY heavy, it still held up. Will edit my review in a couple months to let you know how the wheels are holding up, but so far no complaints here
customer_reviews.author: Vineyard Mom

customer_reviews.title: Rubbermaid- you nailed it!
customer_reviews.text: Good product and best of all, they say no assembly required and they mean it. It was on my porch all set up and ready to work. I did not even have to take it out of a box. Kudos to Rubbermaid.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Great wheelbarrow, love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice WB, easy to maneuver, and holds a lot. I had just got another before this, it was constantly tipping! I’m not very steady, so it was dangerous. I ditched it and got this one, no tipping!
customer_reviews.author: F. Tague

customer_reviews.title: nice item and showed up quick
customer_reviews.text: I have a small yard but need to transport items around not to mention hold all the shovels stuff. Even though it's plastic it really can haul some heavy stuff.
customer_reviews.author: david washington

customer_reviews.title: Great size and easy to use....
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this dump cart. We looked at several in the local hardware stores but they were just a little too big for us. I found this one on Amazon and it was a great price. It arrived packaged great and very quickly. The size is perfect for us to handle mulch and fill dirt for our yard. It is very easy to push and pull and it even has a cup holder. I highly recommend this product for your yard work needs.
customer_reviews.author: piercka1

customer_reviews.title: Best garden cart ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best garden cart ever! It is sturdy and easy to maneuver - I highly recommend it!!!! It also holds a lot!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen7

customer_reviews.title: Poor design.
customer_reviews.text: We had been using 2 wheel barrows to haul firewood. This cart holds as much as the 2 wheel barrows did combined. It holds more than the 200 lbs it is rated for and when loaded it wheels easily. the only down fall is sometimes the rear "legs" drag on the ground and I am 6' tall. UPDATE: my feet hit the bottom of the cart as I wheel it. UPDATE: the bottom broke while hauling much less that 200lbs. What a shame !
customer_reviews.author: relaxrn

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for assist with yard work or shuttleing groceries from car to house. Lightweight and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Scottie

customer_reviews.title: Broken after light use
customer_reviews.text: The body of the cart broke after a year and half of light, infrequent use. I can't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Jensen

customer_reviews.title: great cart!
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it a few times but I am very pleased with this cart! it's better balanced than a regular wheelbarrow. I can just hose it out if it needs cleaning. so far I've used it to move yard waste and sticks. even better, it came in a HUGE box. I left the empty box on my porch and sat in it for a while. the smell of cardboard sent me back to my childhood. :)
customer_reviews.author: houndmama

customer_reviews.title: Finally, something better than a wheel-barrow
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Easy to fill and easy to off-load. The walls will distort if the load is too much--BUT it will not tip over out of control like a wheelbarrow will. If you change your load from concrete slab pieces to just plain dirt then the walls will not distort and you can comfortably move a big load. I did not have a scale handy but the dump truck seemed to carry more, in more comfort, and with more stability. Quite happy.
customer_reviews.author: D. Morris

customer_reviews.title: A useful addition to our lawn care tools
customer_reviews.text: This is a handy and useful addition to our lawn care tools. We use it to haul mulch, grass clipping, sod, trash - you name it. However, we do not haul stone (we use our big wheel barrow). It may be capable of hauling stone, but I like it so much I do not want to break it. At first I wished it was a bit bigger, but now I've decided I like the size because it stores so easily (under our deck).
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lawn cart
customer_reviews.text: Had one like this before and have been looking for a replacement. This one is great.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Ladyman

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS FOR MY GARDEN
customer_reviews.text: Its plenty roomy for hauling, has self area that is nice with a built in drink holder. I love it. This is plenty roomy and I love it, I can move dirt, water and mulch in it and it so easy to balance and drag with one hand. It is the most valueable tool that I bought for my garden. I can even pull my 5 year old in it when he tires out after garden work. I am so glad I got this for cheap but it is worth more. Great tool that I can't say enough about.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: If you need a good lightweight cart get this now
customer_reviews.text: Good product easy to handle if you have back problems or hip problems
customer_reviews.author: James G. OLoughlin

customer_reviews.title: Great biy
customer_reviews.text: Love it...perfect size for yard gardening. Had the same one for years...wore it out!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: It is lightweight which is a good thing and looks durable
customer_reviews.text: It's a lot of plastic and not very attractive but I purchased for my mom and she likes it. It is lightweight which is a good thing and looks durable, although being a molded manufactured piece it did have a small flaw. I can't see the benefits of the cup holder, if you have a load to dump you have to remove your drink. Perhaps that area could be used for something more productive?
customer_reviews.author: Roxanna Bracken

customer_reviews.title: So much better than the typical wheelbarrow
customer_reviews.text: We've put this sturdy barrow to the test, transferring 4 1/2 tons of gravel over several days. It took on the challenge and is ready for more. It's so much easier to use than the one-wheel version, sturdy, yet light and maneuverable. It has a convenient area for tools or drinks :). It arrives fully assembled in a large box, ready to go to work. Best of all, it's made in USA.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cracks almost immediately
customer_reviews.text: The plastic is soft and bends easily, developed cracks and won't hold water anymore. If it cracks a bit more, I will have to toss it recycle.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Finley

customer_reviews.title: Cart review
customer_reviews.text: I like this cart for flat ground gardening and getting around, but going up hill with a heavier load causes it to buckle. I do like the edging at the top for a drink, or in my case, cell phone to play music while I work.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Welch

customer_reviews.title: Sorta Lightweight for the price
customer_reviews.text: Hasn't broken yet. However, as a old gardener and builder it seems a little flimsy. I think it's a stretch to label it commercial. Just would have thought better and a truer representation from Rubbermaid.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Weed

customer_reviews.title: easier than a wheelbarrow
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these carts before, but left it when I sold the home. Replacing it was a good decision. This cart does everything I need it to do. I might not use it if I needed to haul bricks or stones, but for general gardening, it's practically perfect. It's lightweight but sturdy, the bin is big enough to hold lots of stuff, and there are cubbyholes and slots to put your tools.
customer_reviews.author: doctormama

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It is light weight and very easy ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It is light weight and very easy to maneuver. I'm 75 and this is just perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: gonetoread

customer_reviews.title: Tough and Dependable Cart
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement of the same item that I have owned and used for the past 7 years and by my late father-in-law for I do not know how long before he passed away. This lightweight and sturdy, sound and roomy cart is perfect for most yard and garden jobs and projects around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Spell

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Light weight but very sturdy. Easy to pull and won’t tip over with a heavy load.
customer_reviews.author: Maryann Andrus

customer_reviews.title: Solid!
customer_reviews.text: This cart is built well and should hold up for quite a while! Strongly recommended for regular yard work! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Mike W.

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for me, 68 year old lady living alone who loves to garden. It is a very manageable size and weight so I don't have to ask others to help me. Snd it looks cute too.
customer_reviews.author: Caroldig

customer_reviews.title: This works great for tool or picking up cuttings in our yard
customer_reviews.text: This works great for tool or picking up cuttings in our yard. The hard rubber tires work well here since we have lots of thorns and cactus in a desert setting. Traditional wheelbarrows don't work because the tires go flat so frequently. Lightweight and easy to move.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy E. Unger

customer_reviews.title: Nice for light use
customer_reviews.text: Good tool for light weight, occasional use. But not for heavy duty, daily use. Frame tends to bend if you overload it, so I never fill it more than half full. Rear rest legs are awkward and force you take small steps. I usually pull it. But for the price it's handy for the occasional home user.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Very useful.
customer_reviews.text: I had two of these before I moved and always wished I had at least one of them back. It is very functional as long as you recognize this won't haul a ton of dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Etienne

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing.
customer_reviews.text: I moved and left my old trusty one of 20 years old. I got this new one and the quality is not as good as the old one but I still love it!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Marie Q

customer_reviews.title: Great for gardening.
customer_reviews.text: I had bought a used one of these at a yard sale and 5 years later it finally gave up the ghost. It is so sturdy and well made. I can see it lasting at least 10 years. It is great for hauling stuff like bark or potting soil etc. I have used it for so many things. It can handle a lot of weight and it is easy to maneuver when loaded down.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the small yard or garden
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Light, but stable. Carries A LOT of stuff, gets around a small garden area easily, washes clean with little effort. The tool and drink holder area is nice. I would buy it again if this one ever wears out. Very good purchase and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: WildCatMan

customer_reviews.title: Durable, stable, light weight and preassembled! I ...
customer_reviews.text: Durable, stable, light weight and preassembled! I gave this to my sister to help her with her outdoor gardening. She only wishes she had one years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: ... for at least 20 years and it's still in good condition. bought this for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: I've had this cart by Rubbermaid for at least 20 years and it's still in good condition. bought this for my daughter! Excellent design for normal yards.
customer_reviews.author: avid buyer

customer_reviews.title: Low Load Capacity, Too Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Small and flimsy. I have a ton of leaves and dirt to move in my yard but the load capacity on this yard cart is not enough. I should've sprung for the bigger one.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and light weight!
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight, sturdy, and easy to handle. Deeper than I thought, and that's good! It comes in a huge box, completely assembled, just roll it out of the box. As a Senior Female, it is perfect for me. I am sure I will get many years of use from it.
customer_reviews.author: TX Longhorn  Lady

customer_reviews.title: This is such a wonderful light weight way to haul trash and stuff from ...
customer_reviews.text: This is such a wonderful light weight way to haul trash and stuff from the yard. It has places in the handle for tools and my ice water. When it is full it can almost be picked up and dumped yet it holds a lot of stuff. I really think it met my expectations by 200%.
customer_reviews.author: Ann M. Wesbecher

customer_reviews.title: Good value - well made!
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong with this dump truck. Arrived in a box without damage. Prime makes it worth your while to purchase online vs. a storefront. Essy to load, dump, move around in the yard. It is sizable and takes up garage space. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: CZFusion

customer_reviews.title: in her other (perfectly good one) out to the front on roads edge
customer_reviews.text: My wife likes it. She took a young Sycamore tree, in her other (perfectly good one) out to the front on roads edge, and offered the tree for free. Someone came along and took the tree as well as her cart. This is a replacement for the one taken, and hopefully she's learned her lesson.
customer_reviews.author: DiannaRose

customer_reviews.title: Handy, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is really nice! I had a traditional wheel barrel before. It would tend to tip over, was harder to maneuver, and over time, it was rusty/messy looking. This is easy to use, and since it is a rubbermaid, it will be easy to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Roughneck Lawn Cart
customer_reviews.text: Looked for a month for a replacement cart and finally found the rubbermaid for a very reasonable price. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Alvestad

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. Sturdy and easy to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well worth the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: My last one like this lasted 10-12 years. I was so happy Rubbermaid still made them...as a "Senior" Female I can still pick it up to toss the contents into my commercial garbage bin. I had used mine for everything from weeds, rocks, bricks, etc. Has better balance than a wheelbarrow.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Vaught

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for us
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for us, we have a sick horse and a lot of cleaning for the stall, it is light weight, and easy to clean, and easy to roll in and out of the stall. We are so glad we have it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Peace

customer_reviews.title: Cracked after two season's use!
customer_reviews.text: Not the quality I hoped for. I'm an old lady (pushing 70) with arthritis...and I was shocked when I saw a large crack running down the back of my "new" wheelbarrow this summer. Really??? I've not used it 2 seasons! All it ever held was plant clippings and weeds...unlike my old Rubbermaid which I've had over 15 years and took a true beating...like getting large chunks of concrete in it tossed into it...which made it crack. NOT the quality I was expecting from Rubbermaid.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase but a little low to the ground
customer_reviews.text: I like this better than a wheelbarrow but it's a little low and requires hunching and I'm not that tall.
customer_reviews.author: Jiffy Pop

customer_reviews.title: These a great for cleaning the yard
customer_reviews.text: Replacement for worn out unit. These a great for cleaning the yard. Very easy to push and use.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Holding out strong with daily use though its smaller than imagined, maybe a bigger model could be sold?
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with my new wheelbarrow
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my new wheelbarrow. Very sturdily built and easy to handle. I have hauled 2 50lb. bags of livestock feed at one time with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Great little cart
customer_reviews.text: Great little cart. It works like a wheelbarrow but is handles easier due to the handle design. The only reason I didn't give it a five star is because it arrived with the front bent (obviously bent prior to shipment.) The damage wasn't worth the hassle to return.
customer_reviews.author: Gentledragon2

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these almost 20 years ago when it finally was worn out. Delighted to find the same cart with modification to make it even easier to push. Fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Denise M.

customer_reviews.title: great garden cart
customer_reviews.text: This cart replaced a similar rubbermaid garden cart that I used for over 10 years. A bit smaller but still as tough. Love the 4 wheels: no tipping over. Concur with all other positive remarks too, and will add that the horizontal bar makes pushing a load easier than a normal wheel barrow up a grade. Just used to help spread 3 pickups of mulch!
customer_reviews.author: 1cpamom

customer_reviews.title: Little Workhorse
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace one I have had for many years and just wore it out. I have already ready put many substantial loads in this and it performs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Celtic Cutie

customer_reviews.title: Better Than a Wheelbarrow
customer_reviews.text: Love that this is light weight and easy to maneuver. Very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Kim J.

customer_reviews.title: Very handy and easy to move around
customer_reviews.text: Very handy and easy to move around, lightweight enough to pick up. Perfect for everyday garden use around the yard.
customer_reviews.author: LilRedWaz

customer_reviews.title: Tough enough!
customer_reviews.text: This tough tub is a perfect replacement for my last Rubbermaid cart. Though it has been redesigned, and now has a real cup holder (love that!) the quality is definitely there!
customer_reviews.author: Zenergygal

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Rubbermaid, like most other companies, seems to be cutting corners. Either that, or memory fails me, or the definition of "Commercial" has changed.
customer_reviews.author: finzin

customer_reviews.title: Works in tight areas
customer_reviews.text: It takes a load. It is easy to dump. You can just pick it up when empty and put it in a pretty small space. They have some usable holes to put gardening tools.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Computer Guy

customer_reviews.title: Nice I can keep it outdoors
customer_reviews.text: Nice I can keep it outdoors. Handle is on the short side for 5/7" me. Easy to load as I can place front end of cart on ground to avoid lifting stones.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had another but it finally split open....hope this one lasts just as long.
customer_reviews.author: Peter M.

customer_reviews.title: It works OK, but it was a bit too ...
customer_reviews.text: It works OK, but it was a bit too big and heavier than the one I had in my Ohio home. When I moved to SC I did not bring it here, and I had to order another one.
customer_reviews.author: rocky33

customer_reviews.title: Perfect !!
customer_reviews.text: The Roughneck is very sturdy, easily movable, and a good size for me! Perfect for mixing soils for setting out plants in small yard, and it allows for easy storage in my limited garage space. I could not be happier with my purchase --thanks Rubbermaid and Amazon! It will be good, too, for yard clean-up.
customer_reviews.author: Callie

customer_reviews.title: ... shorter than I thought and with the back legs like they are I thought there were back wheels on ...
customer_reviews.text: much shorter than I thought and with the back legs like they are I thought there were back wheels on the item. My old one looks just like this but is built higher and is longer and there are back wheels so I really thought there were and I am short but I still have to lean over to push it.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Pacheco

customer_reviews.title: sturdy & excellent wheels that won't go flat
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Great that it has 2 wheels for balance and that the wheels are plastic so they cannot go flat. Used to haul very heavy paver base and paver sand.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah P.

customer_reviews.title: Good Lawn Cart
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and easy to maneuver but can handle a lot of yard trash--- very pleased with my purchase. Plus it came fully assembled!
customer_reviews.author: Tigercub57

customer_reviews.title: got order
customer_reviews.text: Finally got the garden cart and I love it. Thanks, Patsy Wagner
customer_reviews.author: Patsy Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Light and rugged
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife to work in the yard and it works great for her as it's light and holds a lot. The plastic wheels do make a lot of noise, but work great and don't leak air.
customer_reviews.author: James Agee

customer_reviews.title: Garden cart 7 I love this I use it all the time
customer_reviews.text: Garden cart 7 I love this I use it all the time. So easy to use especially for a woman my age (71)
customer_reviews.author: Pam J

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it now with all the leafs falling great for yard work
customer_reviews.author: Donna Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Great Lil' Wheelbarrow/Lawn Caddy!
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal little workhorse of a wheelbarrow/yard caddy. We've had ours for just four days and had it loaded to the brim with sod, dead branches, potting soil, lawn tools and top soil, and it's holding up wonderfully... Completely satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: all put together when arrived. replacing my old one. hope this one lasts as long.
customer_reviews.author: wilson.sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Love it, exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I have an odd use for it but it is perfect for all jobs around the yard. Easy to handle and very stable.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Patty's mom
customer_reviews.text: As one reviewer commented....this came just wrapped in plastic...no bulky cardboard box! Cut the plastic off & use! Seems very durable. I will be using it to haul dirt for my container plantings. I admit that I am 60+ and it is easily maneuverable! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Linda J. Sturm

customer_reviews.title: Best buy yet!
customer_reviews.text: This cart is well made, light & easy to empty. It stands on end to rake leaves into and doesn't fall over. My Mom is 88 and can use it very easily. Best outdoor helper I've bought yet.
customer_reviews.author: Linda McCready

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for older folks
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my Mom, so I personally am not using it. But, her response has been nothing but positive. Easy to use and maneuver around, holds her "drink" (which we all know is important), and is very steady for multi-task use. Mulch, flowers, rocks, trash, etc. Works well for all.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Schwarz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this sturdy, well balanced, and light weight cart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my mother - very light - easy to use - perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: V.Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Very Happy with this purchase! Just what I wanted. Able to carry 4- 40 lb bags of potting soil at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy Roland

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I had this cart in FL. When I moved, I didn't have room for it. I quickly realized I couldn't do without this handy partner. When I couldn't find it locally, I found it at Amazon! I use it for planting, hauling bricks, tools, anything I need to get from 'A' to 'B', sometimes even the cat! Don't let the lightweight fool you, its heavy construction makes it the perfect replacement for a wheelbarrow but, you can easily hang it on the garage wall.
customer_reviews.author: Freeda Wander

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't ask for a more useful wagon!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Light weight, easy to maneuver, narrow enough to go down my narrow paths. It stores tilted in the upward position so rain and dirt run off. The handle is well designed. Wheels solid, no inflation needed. Spacious enough to hold all my gear and a place for my tea cup. And it came completely assembled in its own plastic bag! Couldn't ask for a more useful wagon. This is an add on comment 8 months later....I still love this wagon and now my daughter has bought one for herself. Great recommendation!
customer_reviews.author: J. B. Glass

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It is light weight but sturdy. Helped a lot with my yard work.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: Very well built lawn wheelbarrow. Light weight but well constructed. Very convenient for smaller backyards. I'm very impressed with the quality and convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B

customer_reviews.title: One of my best buys
customer_reviews.text: As a middle aged woman this cart is a huge help moving heavy items around the yard. Bags of bark, topsoil and even transplanting shrubs are easily done with this sturdy cart.
customer_reviews.author: P. Tremaine

customer_reviews.title: Handy cart
customer_reviews.text: Very handy for moving bags of soil from car to backyard. Moved flower pots around and nothing was broken. Collect trash in yard with this lite weight cart. I have arthritis in thumbs plus other places does not hurt my hands to use this cart.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great Lawn Cart
customer_reviews.text: This dump truck is well-made and perfect for dumping light yard waste. I wheel it around the yard with me while I weed my gardens. I have also used it to carry hedge and brush clippings. Everything dumps out easily into our compost pile. I was worried about the size being too large for my needs, but I like how much it holds. There is even a spot for tools and a water bottle. The wheels are plastic so they will not deflate. That being said, I would probably not use it for extremely heavy loads. It came fully assembled in a large plastic wrapping.
customer_reviews.author: Winnie88

customer_reviews.title: Mom loves it
customer_reviews.text: this I perfect for small jobs. No worries RE flat tire and is light enough to hang for storage. Sturdy and worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: pamela joyner

customer_reviews.title: Nice garbage hauler!
customer_reviews.text: Use it to haul heavy garbage bags. Nice size, easy to use. Wheels are nice and big.
customer_reviews.author: J. W. Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: love this wheelbarrow
customer_reviews.text: LOVE MY WHEELBARROW! it's sturdy and two wheels are better than one for me.
customer_reviews.author: Red Pandamonium

customer_reviews.title: Good for what it was made for.
customer_reviews.text: Seems fine. I got two of them. They hold the rain water quite well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Manuel de la Torre

customer_reviews.title: Dump "Truck" vs. Wheel-barrow
customer_reviews.text: This little item is a fantastic stand-in for a wheel-barrow when you are a single user, and you need a means for expanding dehydrated mulch and placing it easily. I was looking for something that would have better balance than a wheel-barrow (which usually has only one wheel and therefore more wobbly), and would have hard plastic "tires" instead of a pneumatic tire (which most wheel-barrows have), since they have a tendency to go flat with lack of regular airing and use.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki L.

product_meta.title: Rubbermaid Commercial FG370712907 3.25-Cubic Foot Roughneck Lawn Cart Pallet, Platinum
product_meta.description: Rubbermaid Commercial FG370712907 3.25-Cubic Foot Roughneck Lawn Cart Pallet, Platinum. Two fixed wheels provide optimal control and maneuverability. Holds up to 3.25 cubic feet (level capacity) or 4.5 cubic feet (heaped capacity) of contents. Carries up to 200 pounds. 4 inches long by 4 inches wide by 7.5 inches high. 14.66 pounds. Imported.
feature_bullets: Two fixed wheels provide optimal control and maneuverability.
Integrated handle includes a molded-in tool and beverage holder.
Dump trailer holds up to 3.25 cubic feet (level capacity) or 4.5 cubic feet (heaped capacity) of contents.
